General.Name: PCL Technologies Inc
General.Description: PCL Technologies, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, researches, manufactures, and sells optical transceiver products in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers fiber channels, TO-Can packages, and optical sub-assemblies, as well as fiber-to-the-home products to telecommunications and cable television companies. It also provides manufacturing services for various optical components and modules, including sub-assemblies and modules; generic and custom tooling design, and testing support and reliability services; and sales support, post-sales, and supply chain management services. The company serves the network communications, cloud computing, wireless communications, and telecommunications industries. PCL Technologies, Inc. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in George Town, the Cayman Islands.
General.Address: Harbour Place, George Town, Cayman Islands, KY1-1002
